profile.name: John The Baptist
profile.description: I want a room with Wi-Fi enabled, two beds

profile.name: Paul the Apostle
profile.description: I want a room with good scenery

profile.name: Mathew the Apostle
profile.description: I want a quiet room without a bed

comments.saying: 1 In the beginning God created* the heaven and the earth. 2 And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters. 3 And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.

4 And God saw* the light, that it was good: and God divided* the light from the darkness. 5 And God called the light Day, and the darkness he called Night. And the evening and the morning were the first day. 6 And God said, Let there be a firmament in the midst of the waters, and let it divide the waters from the waters.
